dialogueTree.title: You: ""How does the *bullet* in his head..."
dialogueTree.text: "How does the *bullet* in his head factor into this?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Huh?!" A sip of beer makes the sur..."
links.text: "Huh?!" A sip of beer makes the surprise go down easier.

links.title: Elizabeth: ""Titus has already given you a caus..."
links.text: "Titus has already given you a cause of death. Hanging. Why is it so hard for you to understand?" The question is rhetorical.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "She cut in so Titus wouldn't have t..."
links.text: She cut in so Titus wouldn't have to answer.

links.title: Drama: "...or lie. Something he's probably..."
links.text: ...or lie. Something he's probably not very good at.

links.title: Elizabeth: ""If there's any *post-mortem* traum..."
links.text: "If there's any *post-mortem* trauma, it's your problem. This will not turn into a cross-examination."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not quite yet, Mr. Hardie. There w..."
links.text: "Not quite yet, Mr. Hardie. There were eight sets of prints on the crime scene. There are only seven Hardie boys here."

links.title: You: ""The eighth Hardie -- the one who's..."
links.text: "The eighth Hardie -- the one who's missing. She runs the thing, right?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""My answer is: *fuck off*!" He take..."
links.text: "My answer is: *fuck off*!" He takes a step closer. "Mind your own business. There is no *eighth Hardie*. I run this goddamn scene!"

links.title: Suggestion: "Finally, you got something out of h..."
links.text: Finally, you got something out of him. This could prove useful in the future.

links.title: Shanky: ""I know, I know!" The little man ra..."
links.text: "I know, I know!" The little man raises his index finger excitedly. "Fattie walked on all fours. He's so fucking fat he left two sets of footprints."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Despite everything, the little man..."
links.text: Despite everything, the little man is quick on his feet.

links.title: Fat Angus: ""Go fuck your mom, Dennis.""
links.text: "Go fuck your mom, Dennis."

links.title: Elizabeth: ""That's more like it, boys." She tu..."
links.text: "That's more like it, boys." She turns to you. "You heard him, it was Angus on all fours. Anything else you need to know?"

links.title: Elizabeth: ""Aaaand here we go. Back to the usu..."
links.text: "Aaaand here we go. Back to the usual." The woman sighs.

links.title: Volition: "They'll keep blocking this. Return..."
links.text: They'll keep blocking this. Return to this subject later, when they've dropped their guard.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There was a bullet in the dead man..."
links.text: "There was a bullet in the dead man's brain," the lieutenant checks his notes. "Why was it there, if you hanged him?"

links.title: Elizabeth: ""This line of questioning is *over*..."
links.text: "This line of questioning is *over*," the woman interrupts. "You got the cause of death already. Hanging."

links.title: You: ""If you hanged him, why was there a..."
links.text: "If you hanged him, why was there a bullet in his head?"

dialogueTree.title: You: ""You still haven't explained the bu..."
dialogueTree.text: "You still haven't explained the bullet in his head."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""You know, all this talk about bull..."
links.text: "You know, all this talk about bullets and heads makes me think you want one in *yours*."

links.title: Eugene: ""Oh, they're itching for one..." He..."
links.text: "Oh, they're itching for one..." He clacks his tongue. "I listen to Channel 8. These cops have a death wish."

links.title: Drama: "Sire, it would be an event most dra..."
links.text: Sire, it would be an event most dramatic if you were to produce the bullet and dangle it before their very eyes!

links.title: You: ""I'm gonna ask you again, why was t..."
links.text: "I'm gonna ask you again, why was this..." (Show them the bullet) "... in the victim's head?"

links.title: Shanky: ""Wow." The little man leans in to i..."
links.text: "Wow." The little man leans in to inspect the leaden blossom. "He's got it in a real evidence bag and all..."

links.title: Elizabeth: ""Why don't you go home and log it i..."
links.text: "Why don't you go home and log it into evidence. These men have told you what happened."

links.title: You: ""I think the hanging was a cover-up..."
links.text: "I think the hanging was a cover-up for the shooting."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""You know what I think?" He raises..."
links.text: "You know what I think?" He raises his finger. "I think he was shot in the head as a kid. And his brain grew around the bullet."

links.title: Endurance: "It *is* possible to live with an in..."
links.text: It *is* possible to live with an injury like that. Makes you touch the back of your skull, wondering if there's one in there?

links.title: Pain Threshold: "No. You'd remember that. You've bee..."
links.text: No. You'd remember that. You've been shot at four times. Hit twice.

links.title: Alain: ""Around the bullet, man..." Alain p..."
links.text: "Around the bullet, man..." Alain pinches the root of his nose. "That's a good one."

links.title: Drama: "All the goofing around is to avoid..."
links.text: All the goofing around is to avoid lying. It's a technique.

links.title: Empathy: "They're only pretending to enjoy th..."
links.text: They're only pretending to enjoy this. Beneath the act -- they don't like you knowing this.

links.title: You: ""Did you guys shoot him?""
links.text: "Did you guys shoot him?"

links.title: Glen: ""Shit!" He throws his head back. "*..."
links.text: "Shit!" He throws his head back. "*I* probably did shoot him. I was drunk last night. You guys know me when I'm drunk..."

links.title: Shanky: ""Yeah, Glen likes to shoot his guns..."
links.text: "Yeah, Glen likes to shoot his guns when he's drunk." The little guy looks you in the eye. "Better hope he stays sober."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. Death threats," he says calml..."
links.text: "Yes. Death threats," he says calmly. "My partner meant *before* he was hanged."

links.title: Elizabeth: ""Before? After? *During?*" She shak..."
links.text: "Before? After? *During?*" She shakes her head slowly. "I seriously advise you to stop testing these men. They're getting *agitated*."

links.title: Half Light: "*They're* no more agitated than the..."
links.text: *They're* no more agitated than they were a minute ago. She is though.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, he meant *before* he was hange..."
links.text: "No, he meant *before* he was hanged. Did you shoot him *before* you hanged him?"

links.title: You: ""I meant *before* he was hanged.""
links.text: "I meant *before* he was hanged."

links.title: Elizabeth: ""Before? After? *During?*" She spre..."
links.text: "Before? After? *During?*" She spreads her arms. "This is getting ridiculous. They told you what happened. Stop wasting your time."

links.title: You: ""Don't worry, I will figure this ou..."
links.text: "Don't worry, I will figure this out sooner or later." (Conclude.)

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Never been worried in my life, law..."
links.text: "Never been worried in my life, lawman." He crosses his hairy arms, having forgotten his beer for a moment.

links.title: Logic: "It's not like you blew it *wide* op..."
links.text: It's not like you blew it *wide* open, but there's a little crack in there, somewhere...

links.title: Eugene: ""Oh, he's itching for one..." He cl..."
links.text: "Oh, he's itching for one..." He clacks his tongue. "I listen to Channel 8. This cop has a death wish."

dialogueTree.title: You: ""I just found a *bullet* -- in the..."
dialogueTree.text: "I just found a *bullet* -- in the hanged man's head."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""A bullet, you say?" He pats the ba..."
links.text: "A bullet, you say?" He pats the back of his head. "That's mighty curious."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Indeed. *Mighty*. How did it get t..."
links.text: "Indeed. *Mighty*. How did it get there?" The lieutenant is fixed on Titus.

links.title: Titus Hardie: "He gives you an indulgent look. "We..."
links.text: He gives you an indulgent look. "Well there are so many bullets in the world and so many heads..."

links.title: Titus Hardie: "He sighs deeply. "I guess it's only..."
links.text: He sighs deeply. "I guess it's only  logical -- at some point one of them bullets had to end up in one of them heads..."

links.title: Alain: ""It's bound to happen again, you kn..."
links.text: "It's bound to happen again, you know." He taps on his right temple. "Just statistically speaking, of course."

links.title: You: ""Truly curious. If you *hanged* him..."
links.text: "Truly curious. If you *hanged* him, how did it get there?"

links.title: You: ""Curious yes, I guess we'll never k..."
links.text: "Curious yes, I guess we'll never know... About something else though?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""I really don't care." He shrugs an..."
links.text: "I really don't care." He shrugs and looks over his shoulder.

dialogueTree.title: You: ""I found someone who saw the hangin..."
dialogueTree.text: "I found someone who saw the hanging. A witness."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""A witness?" The tall man crosses h..."
links.text: "A witness?" The tall man crosses his arms on his chest. "You ain't got shit. The locals would never come to you with this."

links.title: Alain: ""That's just cop-tactics, Titus. Ne..."
links.text: "That's just cop-tactics, Titus. Next he's gonna tell you one of us already rolled on the others -- and is in witness protection."

links.title: You: ""My witness isn't a local.""
links.text: "My witness isn't a local."

links.title: Titus Hardie: "Titus scratches the back of his hea..."
links.text: Titus scratches the back of his head and asks: "Well, let's hear it then. Who is your mystery fella?"

links.title: Composure: "He's not alarmed by the sudden appe..."
links.text: He's not alarmed by the sudden appearance of a witness. But he is surprised.

links.title: Logic: "This goes without saying, but nonet..."
links.text: This goes without saying, but nonetheless -- don't give out his name.

links.title: You: ""Charles Villedrouin, a high rankin..."
links.text: "Charles Villedrouin, a high ranking government official from Rue de Saint Ghislaine 33-B."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "You can almost see the blood curdle..."
links.text: You can almost see the blood curdle in  the lieutenant's veins. Miraculously he remains silent.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Not only his name, but his address...."
links.text: Not only his name, but his address... You are a goddamn menace.

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""So some Moralintern cronie," he sa..."
links.text: "So some Moralintern cronie," he says with great reproach. "What did he tell you? I bet he had a dead hooker situation, if he came to Martinaise."

links.title: You: ""Let's just say he's a high ranking..."
links.text: "Let's just say he's a high ranking government official -- and leave it at that."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah, right... like we wouldn't kn..."
links.text: "Yeah, right... like we wouldn't know if an MI plant was in our town." Titus looks over his shoulder to his men. "Nice try, right?"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "MI is short for Moralintern. Morali..."
links.text: MI is short for Moralintern. Moralintern is short for Moralist International, the coalition that runs Revachol.

links.title: You: ""Who he *is* is irrelevant.""
links.text: "Who he *is* is irrelevant."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""It's like you said, Al." He turns..."
links.text: "It's like you said, Al." He turns to the man on his left. "Copper's coming up with this on the spot. There is no witness."

links.title: Alain: ""I've seen this shit a million time..."
links.text: "I've seen this shit a million times, Titus. Flyfishing -- they're desperate." He turns to you. "Tell us, copper, what wacky claims did he make?"

links.title: You: ""The witness said the end is here,..."
links.text: "The witness said the end is here, the great undoing. We will all be vapour."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Vapour, huh?" He glances at Alain...."
links.text: "Vapour, huh?" He glances at Alain. "Well, that checks out at least."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""For the record -- which I have to..."
links.text: "For the record -- which I have to type up later tonight -- no apocalypse related testimony was provided to us by the witness."

links.title: Shanky: ""Check out the stand-up comedians t..."
links.text: "Check out the stand-up comedians the RCM has. When are we gonna get funnymen like that?"

links.title: You: ""The witness said the hanging went..."
links.text: "The witness said the hanging went down very quietly. No shouting, no commotion."

links.title: Shanky: ""It's you assholes that feel the ne..."
links.text: "It's you assholes that feel the need to go around like a fucking brass band -- the Hardie boys are dead silent."

links.title: Alain: ""Yeah! It's like they put cowbells..."
links.text: "Yeah! It's like they put cowbells on you before they send you to the streets." He says provokingly. "What's with the cowbells, police man?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "They're avoiding having to answer t..."
links.text: They're avoiding having to answer this question.

links.title: You: ""I'd imagined you guys drinking and..."
links.text: "I'd imagined you guys drinking and singing lynching songs. What's with the funeral silence?"

links.title: Glen: ""We were drinking!" He looks around..."
links.text: "We were drinking!" He looks around. "Weren't we guys? I hit the bottle hard. I was drunk as fuck."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right. I'm convinced, Glen." He no..."
links.text: "Right. I'm convinced, Glen." He nods sarcastically. "Nothing off here. Just a regular hanging."

links.title: Empathy: "Bullseye! Glen looks around uncomfo..."
links.text: Bullseye! Glen looks around uncomfortably. The lieutenant hit a nerve.

links.title: You: "Never mind."
links.text: Never mind.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Yes. Of course. Be *polite* with th..."
links.text: Yes. Of course. Be *polite* with the suspects...

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Damn, they wormed their way out of..."
links.text: Damn, they wormed their way out of it. Somehow... try something else if you can.

links.title: You: ""The witness said he saw two people..."
links.text: "The witness said he saw two people of Areopagite descent. And one Mesque."

links.title: Eugene: ""Areopagite?" He starts laughing. "..."
links.text: "Areopagite?" He starts laughing. "Boss, I think he's trying to say me and Theo."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Well yeah..." Titus nods. "What is..."
links.text: "Well yeah..." Titus nods. "What is confusing you? Eugene, Theo and Alain were there too. I already told you -- we were all there."

links.title: You: ""The witness said it all looked lik..."
links.text: "The witness said it all looked like a *surreal play*."

links.title: Alain: ""Those flaccid MI cocks with their..."
links.text: "Those flaccid MI cocks with their *culture* language." The Mesque spits on the ground angrily. "Everything's a *surreal play* or a *sublime whatever*. Doesn't mean anything."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It means the whole scene was long..."
links.text: "It means the whole scene was long and drawn out. Like it was from a *film*."

links.title: Shanky: ""What is this fella's problem?!" Th..."
links.text: "What is this fella's problem?!" The little guy addresses everyone and no one. "Sorry, we didn't make it more action-packed. It wasn't the first thing on our minds you see."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Shanky -- it's Shanky, right?" He..."
links.text: "Shanky -- it's Shanky, right?" He doesn't wait for an answer. "I thought there's something wrong about the lynching story. Now I *know* there was."

links.title: Shanky: ""You don't know shiiiiiit!""
links.text: "You don't know shiiiiiit!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I know you're lying, Shanky." He w..."
links.text: "I know you're lying, Shanky." He writes in his notebook.

links.title: Suggestion: "You didn't break this wagon fort, b..."
links.text: You didn't break this wagon fort, but you did manage to rattle the people inside a bit.

links.title: You: ""It means the whole scene was long..."
links.text: "It means the whole scene was long and drawn out. Like a movie."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""That means absolutely nothing to m..."
links.text: "That means absolutely nothing to me," he says taking a sip from his can. "Sounds like some made-up horse shit."

links.title: You: ""Actually nothing.""
links.text: "Actually nothing."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Great witness!" He must be really..."
links.text: "Great witness!" He must be really parched, because he takes a giant gulp of beer.

links.title: You: ""Enough about the witness.""
links.text: "Enough about the witness."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Whatever, man. You're really wasti..."
links.text: "Whatever, man. You're really wasting our time with this shit."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Some witness... I pulled the same..."
links.text: "Some witness... I pulled the same shit. Came up with some shit -- then went and said it to people. Get a reaction. Don't have to go to cop school to try that."

links.title: Glen: ""You don't have to go to school for..."
links.text: "You don't have to go to school for shit -- I never went to school and I'm doing great!"

links.title: Eugene: ""You doing a hell of a job, man! He..."
links.text: "You doing a hell of a job, man! Hell of a job!"

links.title: You: ""Let's just drop this.""
links.text: "Let's just drop this."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Your fake witness?" Titus rubs his..."
links.text: "Your fake witness?" Titus rubs his chin. "Yeah, let's do that before this gets embarrassing."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Yes, enough of Charles Villedrouin..."
links.text: "Yes, enough of Charles Villedrouin from Rue de Saint Ghislaine 33-B."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "An almost inaudible whisper from th..."
links.text: An almost inaudible whisper from the lieutenant: "Damn..."

links.title: Half Light: "Okay, maybe it doesn't *feel* like..."
links.text: Okay, maybe it doesn't *feel* like this did anything to them -- but they have to be fretting a *little*. Everyone is afraid of  witnesses. *Witness* is a scary word.

links.title: Rhetoric: "So much bluster to hide the fact th..."
links.text: So much bluster to hide the fact that they're uncomfortable with you having this info.

dialogueTree.title: You: ""Me and Evrart talked. He promised..."
dialogueTree.text: "Me and Evrart talked. He promised you'd cooperate."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Oh, so you went and talked to my m..."
links.text: "Oh, so you went and talked to my mommy -- and now she's making me play with you?" He spits. "Is that it, lawman?"

links.title: Shanky: ""And what's going to happen if we d..."
links.text: "And what's going to happen if we don't?" The little guy leans forward. "You gonna go and *tell* on us?"

links.title: You: ""Very mature, guys. Evrart sent wor..."
links.text: "Very mature, guys. Evrart sent word, right?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah yeah, I heard him. The fuck d..."
links.text: "Yeah yeah, I heard him. The fuck do you think I'm doing here? You'd have your ass handed to you if it wasn't for the bossman's word."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Let me state this very clearly, co..."
links.text: "Let me state this very clearly, coppo." He clears his throat and declares: "Hello, officer! I'm Titus Hardie and these are my boys. Hardie boys. How may we assist you?"

links.title: Authority: "Explosive laughter follows. To his..."
links.text: Explosive laughter follows. To his men, Titus Hardie is a golden god. They want to laugh at his jokes even before they leave his lips. This guy is a born leader.

links.title: Rhetoric: "It would take an army to bend Titus..."
links.text: It would take an army to bend Titus to its will, but having Evrart back you up like that... did seem to have *some* effect.

links.title: You: ""Why don't you push me some more an..."
links.text: "Why don't you push me some more and find out, gimp."

links.title: Shanky: ""You gonna let him talk to me like..."
links.text: "You gonna let him talk to me like that, Titus?" He turns his eyes, full of hurt, to the big man.

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Let's see..." He chuckles. "Yeah...."
links.text: "Let's see..." He chuckles. "Yeah. I guess I am, you big pussy."

links.title: Titus Hardie: "He turns back to you. "The old man..."
links.text: He turns back to you. "The old man sent word you'd be around again. That's the reason I'm being so forthcoming with ya. Don't wear it out."

links.title: You: ""I would *never* tell on someone!""
links.text: "I would *never* tell on someone!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I would though," he says, as casua..."
links.text: "I would though," he says, as casually as if he were commenting on the weather.

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Typical binoclard. Always a tattle..."
links.text: "Typical binoclard. Always a tattletale." He shakes his head resentfully and continues.

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Evrart sent word you two would be..."
links.text: "Evrart sent word you two would be around again. That's the only reason I'm being so forthcoming with ya. Don't wear it out."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Well, snitches get stitches and yo..."
links.text: "Well, snitches get stitches and you don't have any stitches, although by the looks of it you could probably use some." He sizes you up.

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""The old man sent word you'd would..."
links.text: "The old man sent word you'd would be around. That's the only reason I'm being so forthcoming with ya. Don't wear it out."

links.title: You: ""Let's change the subject.""
links.text: "Let's change the subject."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Oh no, Shanks... you hurt his feel..."
links.text: "Oh no, Shanks... you hurt his feelings." He mocks you. "Please ask your little questions, little guy."

dialogueTree.title: You: ""Surprise, Titus! I've connected yo..."
dialogueTree.text: "Surprise, Titus! I've connected you to the local drug trade."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Like hell you have." He leans back..."
links.text: "Like hell you have." He leans back, unruffled. "There is no 'local drug trade'. This place is as clean as a rifle. Go back to Jamrock and ask the local junkies how clean *your* streets are in Precinct '41-Kilos'."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We'll do that. In the meantime," h..."
links.text: "We'll do that. In the meantime," he points south, "did you know that there's an abandoned lorry at the intersection that was used to move raw ingredients for drugs from Terminal B to Jamrock?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We know Ruby was the driver. We kn..."
links.text: "We know Ruby was the driver. We know that's your *affiliation* with her." He taps on his notebook. "Detective, you want to deliver the coup de grace?"

links.title: You: ""No, do the honour, you've earned i..."
links.text: "No, do the honour, you've earned it." (Nod at the lieutenant.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thank you." He turns to face the m..."
links.text: "Thank you." He turns to face the man. "You're right, Titus. There is no local drug trade, because it's all controlled by *you*. *You're* the drug trade."

links.title: You: ""Forget it. I knew they'd never own..."
links.text: "Forget it. I knew they'd never own up to it." (Back off.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The person driving it was present..."
links.text: "The person driving it was present at the hanging. It was one of you. We've connected the footprints." He taps on his notebook, then turns to you. "Detective, do you want to deliver the coup de grace?"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "The thought forms in your head, lik..."
links.text: The thought forms in your head, like a lightning strike branching in the sky.

links.title: Suggestion: "No, the thunder is his. Leave it to..."
links.text: No, the thunder is his. Leave it to the lieutenant.

links.title: You: ""You're right, there is no local dr..."
links.text: "You're right, there is no local drug trade -- except you." (Point at Titus.)

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""That's a mighty interesting theory..."
links.text: "That's a mighty interesting theory." He rubs his jaw, smiling. "I guess that's what you would need to do, theoretically. A big, strong, state run monopoly *would* out-compete the runts on the street."

links.title: Eugene: ""Yeah, man. *Theoretically* that's..."
links.text: "Yeah, man. *Theoretically* that's what you would do -- to get rid of the gangs, the dealers, even some of the junkies."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""You would need good, trustworthy p..."
links.text: "You would need good, trustworthy people to take their place, of course. *Hardy* men to run such a monopoly." He grins. "For the good of the community, of course."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Yes, but that just sends everyone e..."
links.text: Yes, but that just sends everyone else to Jamrock, doesn't it?

links.title: You: ""You've just diverted the flow to J..."
links.text: "You've just diverted the flow to Jamrock. You've made it *our* problem."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""We haven't *done* anything. But th..."
links.text: "We haven't *done* anything. But theoretically, it has to be someone's problem. So it might as well be yours." He takes a sip of his beer and smiles.

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""I don't know," the big man says, s..."
links.text: "I don't know," the big man says, swirling his beer can, "I guess *theoretical* things don't make me emotional. Now, I was sorta going to get my brewskie on."

links.title: Elizabeth: ""Titus, I'm amazed. Where is the sa..."
links.text: "Titus, I'm amazed. Where is the same professionalism when it comes to *other* topics? You're doing great. I hardly have to interfere at all."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""I don't know, Lizzie. I guess *the..."
links.text: "I don't know, Lizzie. I guess *theoretical* things don't make me emotional." He turns to you. "Now was there anything else? I was sorta going to get my brewskie on."

links.title: You: ""This is disgusting. You're admitti..."
links.text: "This is disgusting. You're admitting to profiting off of poisoning your own people."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Boo-fucking-hoo. People will alway..."
links.text: "Boo-fucking-hoo. People will always be taking drugs. Might as well do it clean and organized."

links.title: Eugene: ""Yeah, that's what the labour movem..."
links.text: "Yeah, that's what the labour movement is *all* about. Clean and organized. And the Hardie boys are runnin' it."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Theoretically, of course. We're ju..."
links.text: "Theoretically, of course. We're just talking politics here. My answer to your drug accusation is: *How dare you? Go fuck yourself!*"

links.title: You: ""And what about this Ruby? Is she t..."
links.text: "And what about this Ruby? Is she the eighth Hardie who runs this thing for you?"

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""You sure do love long walks throug..."
links.text: "You sure do love long walks through Theory Town, don't you?" the big guy asks, straightening his cap. "Well, I'm thirsty now. Thirsty for beer. Got any less theoretical questions, cop?"

links.title: Authority: "He doesn't let it show, but must be..."
links.text: He doesn't let it show, but must be a little impressed. You've put a lot of things together, fast.

links.title: Logic: "He's practically saying: yes. A *ye..."
links.text: He's practically saying: yes. A *yes* to everything you said.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "This was good. Every little piece h..."
links.text: This was good. Every little piece helps put the big puzzle together.

links.title: You: ""Fine. I had other questions.""
links.text: "Fine. I had other questions."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""What fucking questions?""
links.text: "What fucking questions?"

links.title: You: ""Good idea. People are always going..."
links.text: "Good idea. People are always going to do drugs. At least this way you have some control over it."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Thank you. Theoretically, of cours..."
links.text: "Thank you. Theoretically, of course. Thank you -- *theoretically*." He takes a sip of his beer and smiles.

links.title: Suggestion: "He seems genuinely surprised at you..."
links.text: He seems genuinely surprised at your response. In a good way.

links.title: You: ""Yeah, keep telling yourself that...."
links.text: "Yeah, keep telling yourself that. I know for a fact there's still plenty of drugs out there."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""No, there aren't. Some little shit..."
links.text: "No, there aren't. Some little shit and his dad are doing speed. Boo-fucking-hoo. The stuff's probably from Jamrock."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Little shit? That's Cuno in the yar..."
links.text: Little shit? That's Cuno in the yard.

links.title: Eugene: ""Whatever you've seen is peanuts. L..."
links.text: "Whatever you've seen is peanuts. Look at the big picture, man. The place is a paradise -- and all thanks to Hardie boys!"

links.title: You: ""There's still plenty of drugs out..."
links.text: "There's still plenty of drugs out there. In fact, I have some in my bloodstream right now."

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Enjoy your shitty ride, junkie-cop..."
links.text: "Enjoy your shitty ride, junkie-cop. We still have it under control. All you're doing is contributing to the local economy. It's just a little hitch."

links.title: Eugene: ""Yeah, there's always gonna be litt..."
links.text: "Yeah, there's always gonna be little sprouts. People find a way to make coin. But that's the little picture... Hardie boys are taking care of the big picture!"

links.title: You: ""Forget it. I knew you'd never own..."
links.text: "Forget it. I knew you'd never own up to it." (Back off.)

links.title: Titus Hardie: ""Own up to what?" he shrugs. "Why d..."
links.text: "Own up to what?" he shrugs. "Why don't you limp out of here, little detective, and keep your nose off my intersection."
